testsuite.name: dungeonmania.mvp.AssassinTest

testcase.name: Testing an assassin can be bribed with a certain amount - 100% bribe rate
Test assassin stops if they cannot move any closer to the player
Test assassin moves around a wall to get to the player
Test assassin in line with Player moves towards them
Testing a failed assassin bribe remains hostile to the player
Testing a second successful bribe makes the assassin an ally
